item.title: My Reasons to Consider Go Coming from Java
item.description: I hate listicles, and I am highly hoping that this doesnâ€™t become one of them. Yet, I somehow felt the need to write down the reasons why I am giving Go a second (or maybe, third ðŸ¤”) chance. To the Java developers out there, searching for a new weapon of choice, I am hoping that this will give you a bit of perspective. This is not a description of Go-specific features.
